mapper.select: select col.COLUMN_NAME, com.COMMENTS as COLUMN_DESC, col.DATA_TYPE, col.DATA_PRECISION, col.DATA_SCALE, col.NULLABLE as NULL_FLAG from user_tab_columns col, user_col_comments com WHERE col.TABLE_NAME= com.table_name and col.COLUMN_NAME = com.column_name and col.TABLE_NAME= #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by col.COLUMN_ID
